bike.description: P. Series double butted Reynolds 520, FGFS geo, singlespeed-specific, integrated headset, MID BB shell, 3D-forged horizontal dropouts, removable "U" brake bosses, w/ integrated chain tensioners

components.description: Hi-Ten tapered and butted Cr-Mo blades, 1-1/8" threadless, 5mm dropouts for 3/8" axle
Integrated 1-1/8" threadless, Campy-style, full cartridge bearings
P. Series drop type, forged alloy, front load w/ CNC side holes, black hardware, 22.2mm
Butted Cr-Mo riser bar, 75mm rise, 8º backsweep, 2º upsweep, 22.2mm
P. Grip, flanged soft compound, open end w/ endplug, 150mm
Tektro U-brake, alloy, soft compound pads
Alloy "V"-brake, two-finger, linear pull
Singlespeed, convertible fixed/freewheel, 10t
KMC Z510XRB, 1/2" x 1/8", heavy duty, anti-drop inner links
3pc. tubular, heat-treated Cr-Mo for 48 spline, 175mm length
CNC cut 6061, 25T, Motostar design
MID BB, 2x sealed cartridge bearing w/ 19mm, 8-spline spindle, alloy tube, and cone spacers
P. Lo Pro nylon platform w/ molded pins, loose ball, 9/16", w/retention straps
P. 26, alloy double-wall, 36mm, pinned, 36h
Mid-flange, 2x sealed cartridge bearing, 3/8" forged female bolt-in axles w/ 7075 alloy inner axle, 36h
Rear hub, convertible fixed/freewheel cog driver cassette, 4x sealed cartridge bearing, CNCd 10t cog driver, hollow 14mm Cr-Mo axle, 23mm contact, 17mm axle nuts, 36h
Stainless, 2.0mm (14g)
Specialized Compound Control, 60 TPI, aramid bead, 26x 2.2"
Specialized Compound Control, 60 TPI, aramid bead, 26x 2.2"
Schrader valve
P. Series, 1pc co-molded composite saddle and alloy seat post combination, w/ embossed "P. Series" logo padded cover
Alloy, 25.4mm, no offset
Integrated Cr-Mo bolt and nylock nut
Reflectors, owners manual
